txt.en: The horse looks more comfortable and shows signs of trusting you...
The stable-helper wants you to assist the new horse in settling into its new stall in the Combe horse stables.

'An unusual horse arrived in the stable here down at the end, but I have no time to help him settle into his new stall. I need to tend to these other horses or the stable-master will have my head! Would you please help me tend to the horse's stall and make sure he has everything he needs?\n\n'For new horses, I usually check the bedding for freshness and the trough for grain. Make sure he has plenty of water, too!'
The new horse in the Combe stables needs some help settling into his new stall.

'Thank you for your help! That horse looks more comfortable in the new stall already, and appears to be pretty well taken care of now. You may have acquired a new friend in this horse; he seems to have taken a liking to you.'
The newly arrived horse in Combe may be found in his new stall.\n\nThe horse is strange to Combe and is still uneasy in his new environment. <rgb=#FF0000>Pat</rgb> the horse to comfort him.
The stable-helper is near the stables of Combe.
<rgb=#FF0000>Pat</rgb> the horse to comfort him in his new stall
